item.title: vAPP coronagraph
item.description: The vector Apodizing Phase Plate coronagraph (vAPP) surpressed starlight on both sides of a star using an achromatic pupil-plane coronagraph based on liquid-crystal technology. This enables an improved detection and characterization of exoplanets and their atmospheres.

item.title: The vector-APP: a broadband apodizing phase plate that yields complementary PSFs
